name: Ultimate Hunting: Jungle Wild
description:
Ultimate Hunting: Jungle Wild Animal is a brand new wild sport real hunting and sniper shooting experience. Aim, Shoot and Kill, be the perfect hunter in “Animal Sniper” adventure game, use your modern deadly sniper rifles and firearm to take the exciting shot, this wonderful sniper weaponries are especially designed to best handgun with a specially controlling zoom, unlimited ammo with powerful pierce bullets. You are equipped with many similar weapons like sniper gunfire. Use suitable handgun according to the situation. Prove That, You have the best hunter and show sniper abilities to shoot down the safari animals.
FEATURES
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Gameplay is simple yet entertaining.
- Efficient sniper gun control.
- True to life hunting experience.
- High fidelity cool graphics.
• Dangerous yet beautiful environment Full of wild animals.
• Variety of Animals to Kill.
• Best 3D Forest environment.
